casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Terrence Lamont BOYD Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 21, 2017

Richard H. Stannard III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Linda Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 437, 169 A.3d 842 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON and MULLINS, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
